languages.text: Этим почтенным мечом владел достойнейший агрокнязь Иллумиан Вьят аб Арам, служивший паладином губернатора Януса четыре века назад. В темный час восстания подлой секты Помазанных землей славный Иллумиан спас покровителя от ворвавшейся во дворец черни и подавил бунт, щедро напоив кровью серфов благородный клинок.

This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.
languages.original_text: Этим почтенным мечом владел достойнейший агрокнязь Иллумиан Вьят аб Арам, служивший паладином губернатора Януса четыре века назад. languages.text: 这把受人敬畏的宝剑原本的主人，是农业世界尊贵的王子伊洛伊安·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆。四百年前，他曾是加努斯总督手下的圣骑士。当时，卑劣的邪教教众“大地受膏者”发动了叛乱。危急时刻，勇猛的伊洛伊安杀进了闯入宫殿的叛军之中，救下了总督，用那些暴乱分子的鲜血平息了这场叛乱。
languages.original_text: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.

traits.locale_text: 这把受人敬畏的宝剑原本的主人，是农业世界尊贵的王子伊洛伊安·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆。四百年前，他曾是加努斯总督手下的圣骑士。当时，卑劣的邪教教众“大地受膏者”发动了叛乱。危急时刻，勇猛的伊洛伊安杀进了闯入宫殿的叛军之中，救下了总督，用那些暴乱分子的鲜血平息了这场叛乱。

languages.text: この敬うべき剣は、4世紀前にヤヌスの総督のパラディンとして仕えた、最も名誉ある農業王子イルミアン・ヴィヤット・アブ・アラムが振るっていたものである。暗黒の時代、注がれた地球の卑劣な一派が反乱を起こした時、栄光のイルミアンは、宮殿を襲撃した暴徒からパトロンを救い、農民の血でこの高貴な剣の渇きを癒すことで反乱を鎮めた。
languages.original_text: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.

traits.locale_text: この敬うべき剣は、4世紀前にヤヌスの総督のパラディンとして仕えた、最も名誉ある農業王子イルミアン・ヴィヤット・アブ・アラムが振るっていたものである。暗黒の時代、注がれた地球の卑劣な一派が反乱を起こした時、栄光のイルミアンは、宮殿を襲撃した暴徒からパトロンを救い、農民の血でこの高貴な剣の渇きを癒すことで反乱を鎮めた。

languages.text: Esta venerable espada fue blandida por el honorable príncipe agrícola, Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, que sirvió de paladín del gobernador de Janus hace cuatro siglos. En su momento más aciago, durante la rebelión de la perversa secta de los Ungidos de la Tierra, el glorioso Illumian salvó a su patrón de la chusma que asaltaba el palacio y sofocó la rebelión saciando la sed de su noble acero con la sangre de la plebe.
languages.original_text: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.

traits.locale_text: Esta venerable espada fue blandida por el honorable príncipe agrícola, Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, que sirvió de paladín del gobernador de Janus hace cuatro siglos. En su momento más aciago, durante la rebelión de la perversa secta de los Ungidos de la Tierra, el glorioso Illumian salvó a su patrón de la chusma que asaltaba el palacio y sofocó la rebelión saciando la sed de su noble acero con la sangre de la plebe.

languages.text: Cette vénérable épée vieille de quatre siècles appartenait au très honorable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, paladin du gouverneur de Janus. Le glorieux Illumian sauva son protecteur de la populace ayant pris d'assaut le palais lors de la rébellion de la méprisable secte des Consacrés par la Terre et réprima la révolte en étanchant la soif de cette noble lame avec du sang de manant.
languages.original_text: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.

traits.locale_text: Cette vénérable épée vieille de quatre siècles appartenait au très honorable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, paladin du gouverneur de Janus. Le glorieux Illumian sauva son protecteur de la populace ayant pris d'assaut le palais lors de la rébellion de la méprisable secte des Consacrés par la Terre et réprima la révolte en étanchant la soif de cette noble lame avec du sang de manant.

languages.text: Dieses ehrwürdige Schwert wurde von dem hochverehrten Agri-Prinz Illumian Vyatt ab Aram geführt, der vor vier Jahrhunderten als Paladin beim Gouverneur von Janus in Diensten stand. In den dunkelsten Stunden, während der Rebellion durch die widerwärtige Sekte der Erdgesalbten, rettete der ruhmreiche Illumian seinen Gönner vor dem Pöbel, der den Palast gestürmt hatte, und schlug den Aufstand nieder, indem er den Durst dieser edlen Klinge mit Bauernblut stillte.
languages.original_text: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.

In den dunkelsten Stunden, während der Rebellion durch die widerwärtige Sekte der Erdgesalbten, rettete der ruhmreiche Illumian seinen Gönner vor dem Pöbel, der den Palast gestürmt hatte, und schlug den Aufstand nieder, indem er den Durst dieser edlen Klinge mit Bauernblut stillte.

languages.text: Bu muhterem kılıç, dört asır önce Janus valisine paladin olarak hizmet etmiş pek şerefli ziraat prensi İllumian Vyatt ab Aram tarafından kullanılmıştır. Şanlı İllumian, Toprakla Vaftiz Edilmişler mezhebinin kalleşçe isyanı sırasındaki o karanlık saatlerde efendisini sarayı basan ayaktakımından kurtarmış ve bu asil kılıcın susuzluğunu köylü kanıyla dindirerek isyanı bastırmıştır.
languages.original_text: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.
